name: JobInterviewPlanInfo
description:
Retrieve a job's interview plan details.

Fetches the interview plan for a specific job, detailing the activities and interviews required at each stage. Useful for understanding the scheduling needs and process of a job interview.

parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the job to retrieve the interview plan for. It is required to fetch the specific job's interview plan details.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
